00079 typedef enum MultiresModifiedFlags {
00080     /* indicates the grids have been sculpted on, so MDisps
00081      * have to be updated */
00082     MULTIRES_COORDS_MODIFIED = 1,
00083     /* indicates elements have been hidden or unhidden */
00084     MULTIRES_HIDDEN_MODIFIED = 2
00085 } MultiresModifiedFlags;
